title: Carson Ellis
content:
[http://www.carsonellis.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015184451/http:/www.carsonellis.com/)   
   
Very stylish artist with loads of hand drawn type. A real treat.
author: nic_mulvaney

comments.content:
Very solid. Quaint also.   
(Quibble: it's lettering, not type.)   
There's a long tradition of illustrator/designers who combine a casual linear drawing style, strong graphic layouts, and casual typographically aware, historicist lettering.   
A graphic novel could bring the many talents together into something substantial.
